scripts.build:css: npx sass src/styles/main.scss dist/temp.css --no-source-map && npx tailwindcss -i ./dist/temp.css -o ./dist/styles.css --minify
scripts.watch:css: npx concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npx sass --watch src/styles/main.scss dist/temp.css" "npx tailwindcss -i ./dist/temp.css -o ./dist/styles.css --watch"
